channel.title: Hello, I am Kyle
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Kyle M. Brown. Developer by nature however I have made a larger impact by [consulting][1] with business owners to help them bring efficiency to the operations side of their business through software and processes.
I decided recently to venture into the WordPress plugin space. My first plugin helps create step-by-step instructions on the web @ [http://wordpress.org/plugins/step-by-step/][2]
Looking forward to helping and being helped by this group.
[1]: http://www.mayvik.com/ [2]: http://wordpress.org/plugins/step-by-step/

item.title: Hello, I am Kyle

item.description:
Thanks @tnorthcutt ! Looking forward to learning.
